meanings.definition: To shout or call out loudly.
meanings.sent1: She hollaed for help when she saw the fire.
meanings.sent2: He hollaed across the field to his friend.
meanings.sent3: The little boy hollaed with joy when he won the game.
meanings.sent4: The coach hollaed instructions to the players on the field.
meanings.sent5: The teacher hollaed the answer so all the students could hear.

meanings.definition: Past tense of holla, meaning to greet or get someone's attention.
meanings.sent1: They hollaed at each other from across the street.
meanings.sent2: She hollaed a hello as she entered the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat hollaed at the birds outside the window.
meanings.sent4: He hollaed to his friend in the crowded market.
meanings.sent5: The children hollaed with excitement when they saw the ice cream truck.
